Package com.soen6441.core.map

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GridMap  
    MapItem
    This class will define the amount of distance the object has to travel along the path in the Map.
    MapPath
    This class will define the amount of distance the object has to travel along the path in the Map.
    MapPoint
    The class MapPoint will define a point on the map by its x and y coordinates.
    MapValidator
    This class will check whether the map is valid or not.In addition, this class will provide methods to generate paths on the map
    PlayManager
    The class PalyManager will handle the task of saving the gamePlay in XML file and reading the XML file to generate gamePlay;
    Road
    This class will represent Road which is a MapItem.It extends MapItem and also define additional methods specific to it.
